name: Survival Shore
description:
Survival Shore is a simple game where you just have to craft a raft to survive the island you have been washed up on. 

TO COMPLETE THE GAME
Unfortunately I didn't have time for tutorials :( but the concept is simple

-Make a knife with a stick and a rock, this will help you gather all other elements
-Add two grasses together to craft cloth
-add cloth and grass to craft rope
-Add Iron and Iron for the raft frame (don't question me)
-Add the frame and the rope to make a boat and beat the game

*!Controls!*

I - inventory

Click on things you've picked up in your inventory to add them to craft window

Esc or P - pause
Left Click - stab at mine-y thing like a boss
